items.title: About Me
items.content: As a highly skilled Python Backend Engineer, I specialize in leveraging GIS technologies, cloud development, and AI/ML integration to drive digital transformation and optimize processes. My systemic approach to problem-solving allows me to create innovative, data-driven solutions that enhance operational efficiency and provide actionable insights.

items.title: Key Accomplishments
points: Led the transformation of disparate custom Python SaaS tools into a unified Django-based platform, significantly enhancing efficiency and user experience.
Improved data handling by automating interactions with external Postgres/PostGIS databases using Python ORM libraries within Django applications.
Streamlined data cleaning, engineering, and integration processes with custom Python pipelines, boosting productivity.
Ensured scalable, maintainable applications by leveraging Azure for production deployments and Docker for containerization.

items.title: Leadership and Excellence
points: Promoted software development best practices through Git, Azure DevOps/GitHub, test automation, and CI/CD workflows, fostering a culture of excellence.
Enhanced team capabilities by conducting hands-on training sessions on industry standards and emerging technologies.

items.title: AI/ML Development
points: Developed AI-powered solutions, focusing on chains, agents, and multimodal Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems.
Integrated machine learning models to enhance data-driven decision-making, utilizing tools like Hugging Face, Langchain, and powerful LLMs like OpenAI and Gemini.

items.title: Continuous Learning and Innovation
points: Deepening proficiency in React/Next.js to boost frontend capabilities, while advancing in machine learning and deep learning to drive innovation in Django applications.
Engaging in continuous R&D to adopt cutting-edge AI/ML technologies, ensuring adaptability and innovation within automated applications.

items.title: Continuous Improvement Advisor
items.details: I drive digital transformation and process optimization initiatives, combining Python automations and GIS technologies to deliver innovative solutions.
responsibilities: Led GIS technologies adoption, enhancing team capabilities from FTTH network design to civil engineering analysis.
Established complex visualization solutions for permitting and construction maps.
Mentored and trained a new developer team, fostering best practices (Git, DevOps, testing).
Provided GIS and Python training to equip team members and ensure smooth technical handover.
Architected a centralized cloud-based Django application, consolidating and enhancing Python SaaS tools into a scalable, user-friendly platform.
Improved maintainability and accessibility, leveraging Azure for cloud computing and deployment strategies (CI/CD).
Designed Python SaaS tools for data cleaning/engineering, spatial analysis, and database management, reducing administrative overhead.
Led the R&D team in exploring new technologies and integrating tailored ML capabilities, emphasizing user-friendliness.

items.title: Fiber Network Designer & Automation Engineer
items.details: Results-driven Fiber Network Designer and Python-GIS Automation Engineer.
responsibilities: Drafting and updating deliverables such as splicing sheets and schematics.
Conducting quality control checks to maintain design accuracy and quality.
Performing load calculations for aerial structures using SimPAS software.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to achieve project objectives.
Creating custom tools using AutoLISP for AutoCAD and AutoCAD Map 3D.
Orchestrated initiatives to implement and manage GIS systems with QGIS, and develop custom geoprocessing models.
Led the development of a suite of Python automations, enhancing efficiency, reducing manual labor, and streamlining processes.

items.title: CEO & Co-Founder
items.details: As the CEO and co-founder, I guide the strategic vision and technical direction of our creative venture.
responsibilities: Define the overarching vision and strategic roadmap for NJAE Plume.
Lead the technical development and implementation of our e-commerce platform, transitioning from Wordpress to a Django-based solution.
Defined our tech stack strategy, enabling smooth integration with React for frontend development and laying the foundation for future expansion.
Manage all aspects of the business, including administrative tasks, finances, and regulatory compliance.

items.title: Master's Degree (MSc) in Geography
items.details: Spatial analysis, environmental studies and coastal risks management. Hydrogeomorphology and climatology. Cartography and GIS (ArcGIS, QGIS).

items.title: Bachelor's Degree in Geography
items.details: Fundamentals of Geography. Geomorphology, hydrology and climatology. Environmental hazards and risks management. Cartography and GIS (ArcGIS, QGIS).

items.title: Machine Learning
items.details: Certificate in Machine Learning covering supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and best practices in machine learning.

items.title: Deep Learning
items.details: Certificate in Deep Learning focusing on neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and advanced machine learning techniques.
